Super camera
11 Jun 2015 By Shiva Kabra On flipkart.com

This is one of the best camera's for low light situations around. Expensive but great. Availability of lenses is a little bit of an issue but plenty of those also there in the market now.

Auto Focus Yes, Contrast detection

Manual Focus Yes

Microphone Yes
